images_to_dataframe(directory)[source]#

Reads image files into a data structure and saves in LaME format.

import_files()[source]#

Opens an import dialog from MapImporter to open selected data directories.

import_spots()[source]#

Import a data file with spot data.

initialize_sample_object(outlier_method, negative_method)[source]#

Initializes sample objects for each sample in the application.

This method creates a sample object for each sample in the application and stores it in the MainWindow.data dictionary.

open_directory(path=None)[source]#

Open directory with samples in *.lame.csv files.

Executes on MainWindow.actionOpen and MainWindow.actionOpenDirectory. Opening a directory, enables the toolboxes.

Alternatively, open_dicrectory is called after MapImporter successfully completes an import and the tool is closed.

Opens a dialog to select directory filled with samples. Updates sample list in MainWindow.comboBoxSampleID and comboBoxes associated with analyte lists. The first sample in list is loaded by default.

Parameters:

path (str) – Path to datafiles, if None, an open directory dialog is openend, by default None

open_project()[source]#

Open a project session.

Restores a project session: data, analysis, and plots.

open_sample(path=None)[source]#

Opens a single *.lame.csv file.

Opens files created by MapImporter. :param path: Path to datafile, if None, an open directory dialog is openend, by default None :type path: str

populate_spot_table()[source]#

Populates spot table when spot file is opened or sample is changed

Populates MainWindow.tableWidgetSpots.

save_project()[source]#

Save a project session

Saves (mostly) everything for recalling later.
